title: MBP A2338 - board 820-02020 No image int.
message:
Hi' everybody. I have a M1 MBP from 2020 with a liquid damage. CL053 PP3V3_S2_WLBT_ISNS was shorted, replaced and now the MBP is running. I get image on external screen but not on internal. I have tested on other known good display without any image. Testet in known good housing as well - no luck. On the old MB you easily see if it is backlight. But not anymore:).
Any suggestions where to look first? I looked at schematics but I can not find any issues. Thank you in advanced.

title: MBP A2338 - board 820-02020 No image int.
message:
Missing image and backlight at same time?
LPDP_INT_HPD goes high?
Do you get any voltage at PPVOUT_LCDBKLT?

title: MBP A2338 - board 820-02020 No image int.
message:
Hi again. Sorry i answer you so late but I was out of Office when you wrote.

LPDP_INT_HPD is = 1.15 v stable
PPVOUT_LCDBKLT = approx 12 v dropping fast to allmost nothing. Not good i suppose🥵

title: MBP A2338 - board 820-02020 No image int.
message: Check the traces for DP800 and QP801.

title: MBP A2338 - board 820-02020 No image int.
message: Finally… now it is image, but no backlight. Should I replace UP800.

title: MBP A2338 - board 820-02020 No image int.
MBP A2338 - board 820-02020 No image int.
message: Yes… still a drop. Slow drop… but I can not see failures on the mentioned traces. But something/somewhere it drains for voltage on that line.

title: MBP A2338 - board 820-02020 No image int.
MBP A2338 - board 820-02020 No image int.
message:
If starts dropping from 12V, means that UP800 enables QP800 at first moment.
Some problem is detected and is disabled.
Check DP800 and QP800/801.
Be sure all adjacent resistors and traces are good.

title: MBP A2338 - board 820-02020 No image int.
message: Thank you. I will do it right tomorrow. Thank you very much.

title: MBP A2338 - board 820-02020 No image int.
message: Hi’ I have an issue on th QP800. The enable pin on UP800 is 1,2 volt. But it keeps shutting down. I need to find a donor and then I will let you know. Thank you 2Informaticos for yiu Gold nuggets until now:-).

title: MBP A2338 - board 820-02020 No image int.
message:
As per schematic, 1.2V at BL_PWR_EN is suficient to enable UP800.
GPIO block of U8100 is probably powered from 1.8V...
